identified-content.object.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Scene from Pokemon: The Johto Journeys, which premieres on Kids' WBF

block.p: Ash, center, and his friends (from left, Pikachu, Cyndaquil, Chikorita and Totodile) travel to a mysterious land where more than 100 unfamiliar faces await them in ''Pokemon: The Johto Journeys,'' which has its weekday premiere on Friday at 4 p.m. on Kids' WB. (Nintendo)

Ash, center, and his friends (from left, Pikachu, Cyndaquil, Chikorita and Totodile) travel to a mysterious land where more than 100 unfamiliar faces await them in ''Pokemon: The Johto Journeys,'' which has its weekday premiere on Friday at 4 p.m. on Kids' WB. (Nintendo)
